QuestData.Title: One Last Request
QuestData.Description:
I can feel my bonds to this place slipping, and I have you to thank.
I would like to ask one more favor of you though. Please bring the ring you found to Lucille. It was meant for her to hold, not my dusty bones.
And $c, do not tell her what has transpired here. She has enough tragedy weighing down her heart. I do not wish to add to it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Treadward's Ring to Lucille Waycrest at Watchman's Rise.
QuestData.RewardText:
This... this is the ring Alexander was to give me at our wedding. I had thought it long lost...
I do not know how you found this, $c, but words cannot say how grateful I am. Alexander was very dear to me, and this ring was a symbol of the strength of our love.
It is good to feel that again...
